articles.description: President Donald Trump on Friday dismissed concerns that his Twitter account could be hacked, saying it "shouldn't be too bad" if it happened. Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey's account was hacked on Friday, immediately prompting questions about how secure Trump's acc…
articles.content:
President Donald Trump on Friday mused about the possibility of his infamous Twitter account being hacked, but dismissed the scenario and said it "shouldn't be too bad" if it happened. 
 The topic came up shortly after Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey's account was h… [+1215 chars]

articles.author: Rosalie Chan
articles.title: A California official says red-hot coding bootcamp Lambda School is violating state law if it operates without the right registration — but the company insists classes can go on

articles.content: On Thursday, Business Insider reported that Lambda School — a hot coding bootcamp with backing from big names like Y Combinator and GV (formerly Google Ventures) — had been given a citation in July that ordered it to cease operations until and unless it prope… [+4621 chars]

articles.author: Katie Canales
articles.title: For less than $100, you can tour the abandoned towns around Chernobyl. Just watch out for radioactive trees and dogs, crumbling buildings, and the occasional selfie stick.
articles.description: On April 26, 1986, the world saw its worst nuclear disaster in history when an explosion at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant, in what was then the Soviet Union, resulted in a cloud of radioactive particles spreading across parts of Europe. About 350,000 peop…

articles.author: Steven John
articles.title: The best shoe brands for kids
articles.description: Rather than shopping around every time your child outgrows a shoe, you can make it easier on yourself by identifying which shoe brands are best suited to the various aspects of your child's life. Then simply size up as needed. While many companies offer a ran…
articles.content:
Plae shoes are comfortable from the first minute a kid slips them on, something most kids can do with ease thanks to the Velcro tabs. 
 If you are looking for a go-to shoe for your kid, you're looking in the right place with Plae. Their shoes are casual, com… [+2509 chars]

articles.author: Alexei Oreskovic
articles.title: It took Twitter longer to secure Jack Dorsey's account from hackers than it would for a nuclear missile to travel around the world - and that should terrify you
articles.description: Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey's account was hacked on Friday. The hackers unleashed a tweetstorm of offensive, racist tweets. Everyone who watched the events seemed to have the same thought: If Twitter can't protect its CEO's account from hackers, how can it protec…
articles.content:
On Friday afternoon, at 12:44 p.m. PT, the internet stood still and watched as something terrifying unfolded over the next 20 minutes. 
 Jack Dorsey, the CEO of Twitter, had his account hacked, and it proceeded to tweet a barrage of offensive and racist twee… [+3124 chars]

articles.title: Trump's 28-year-old personal assistant was reportedly fired after gossiping about his daughters
